Pre-Game Insights: Houston Rockets demonstrate excellent play on defense and allow only 106.6 points per game on average - third place in the league in this indicator.
The team has been winning steadily and currently sits in third place in the Western Conference with a 21-11 record.
The Rockets lost two in a row, first to Minnesota and then to Miami.
The Mavericks have three losses in the last four games - a consequence of Luka Doncic's injury.
Dallas' position may deteriorate noticeably in the very near future.
Expert Betting Tips: Houston has one of the best defenses of the current season, while Dallas is having problems on offense in the absence of Luka Doncic.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup will take place on January 2 at the Toyota Stadium in Houston.
The odds for the total under 222.5 are 1.87.
Amen Thompson will miss the next two matches of his team due to a mass brawl incident.
